titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

p.hi: I walked to Lambeth under a dropping sky, & in a murky atmosphere.
The Archbishop made a statement of his behaviour in respect of the Church & State Report
for answer, but I said nothing being under his roof. I came away in time to lunch at the Club. Then I went to Paddington & returned to Hereford.
